title: Turmeric Serum for Face & Body - All Natural Turmeric Skin Brightening Oil for Dark Spots - Cleanses Skin, Fights Acne, Evens Tone, Heals Scars - Pure Handcrafted Turmeric Skincare Made in the USA
features: SKIN BRIGHTENING SERUM: Raw form of turmeric oil heals the appearance of colored spots, age spots, hyperpigmentation, melasma & acne scars. It gives dull skin a brighter, healthier glow & smooth tone!

CLEANSES & HEALS SKIN: The serum reaches deep into pores & draws impurities like a magnet. Skin detoxing serum prevents bacteria buildup & shrinks the size of pores to give skin an evenly refined finish.
SAFE & EFFECTIVE SKINCARE: Turmeric skin brightening face & body serum recommended for all skin types. It helps heal dry skin, damaged skin, aging skin, stressed skin, uneven skin, acne-prone skin.

HANDCRAFTED IN THE USA: Handcrafted from the purest ingredients available, the all-natural turmeric face oil is as pure as they come. Proudly made in the USA, 100% Phthalate-free, No additives, synthetics, or artificial fragrances.

TURMERIC FACIAL SERUM: Our handmade serum for women, men & children exceeds quality standards to bring you the very best skincare products. Made with raw turmeric oil, this natural serum is our pride & joy!
description: Our turmeric oil face serum is a skin brightening facial serum formulated to brighten colored spots  & boost glow. It also helps treat wrinkles by firming skin to give it a smooth & plump texture.  Enhanced with all natural extracts, it's the purest & most natural turmeric serum for face care.
: Rich in omega fatty acids (particularly linoleic acid), this plant-based oil  helps prevent acne breakouts by detoxifying clogged pores bogged down by impurities.
: Full of antioxidants, anti-inflammatory enzymes, vitamin A & vitamin C,  aloe replenishes moisture, tightens loose skin, promotes rejuvenation & speeds up healing.
: Brightens skin, heals acne scars, heals sun damage, promotes wound  healing, slows hair growth & boosts glow to give the complexion a youthful radiant tone.
: An anti-aging powerhouse, this essential oil has therapeutic properties  & astringent qualities shown to help refine large pores, heal scars & cleanse age spots.
: Loaded with vitamins A, C & E, this non-comedogenic oil replenishes  skin with collagen boosting nutrients essential for smoothing fine lines & plumping wrinkles.
: Easily absorbed by the skin, antibacterial & antifungal, lemon oil helps keep  pores clean to reduce the appearance of blackheads. It also helps reduce hyperpigmentation.
: Brimming with concentrated levels of vitamin C, this oil has been shown  to have regenerative, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, anti-aging & skin healing properties.
DIRECTIONS: remove bottle from dropper, dispense a few drops of serum onto fingertips  & then gently massage into clean, dry skin until fully absorbed before applying moisturizer.
